teachersV2.io
Class FileWrite

java.lang.Object
  teachersV2.io.FileWrite

public class FileWrite
extends java.lang.Object

Contains the implementation for writing lines in the File - Version 2

Copyright 2012 - This file is part of the Java Project : Teachers.

Teachers is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the zlib license.
See the COPYING file.

Method Detail

write

public void write(java.lang.String filename)
           throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
Contains the implementation of the writing on a new file. The file is dependant of a list which got all students in memory. We write on the file while all the students haven't already been deleted in the list.

Parameters:
filename - The name of the file to save.
Throws:
java.io.FileNotFoundException - If the File is not found or contains error in the format.

getFilename

Getter for the file.

Returns:
The filename.
